mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_IMAGE myimage where myimage.PICID = #{picId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_IMAGE myimage ( myimage.PICID, myimage.PICNAME, myimage.PICURL, myimage.CREATETIME, myimage.CREATOR ) VALUES( #{picId:VARCHAR}, #{picName:VARCHAR}, #{picUrl:VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{creator:VARCHAR}
)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_IMAGE myimage SET myimage.PICNAME = #{picName:VARCHAR}, myimage.PICURL = #{picUrl:VARCHAR}, myimage.CREATOR = #{creator:VARCHAR} WHERE myimage.PICID = #{picId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_IMAGE myimage WHERE myimage.PICID=#{picId}

DELETE FROM TB_IMAGE WHERE PICID in
#{ids}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_IMAGE myimage WHERE 1=1 order by myimage.CREATETIME desc
